definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: In the beginning, the search engine is only an accessorial tool in some famous portal sites.
sentences.chinese: 起初，搜索引擎只是一些著名门户网站的辅助工具。

sentences.english: I want a portal combined or integrated with a business directory.
sentences.chinese: 我希望有一个门户网站合并或企业目录中。

sentences.english: Myself also thinks the website of trade family status that does verticality has an outlook.
sentences.chinese: 我自己也认为做垂直性的行业门户网站是有前途的。

sentences.english: One of the top five news portals is Google News.
sentences.chinese: 五大新闻门户网站之一是谷歌新闻。

sentences.english: Portals and related third-party applications form a special network environment.
sentences.chinese: 门户网站与第三方应用组成了一个独特的网络环境。

sentences.english: Finally, the author proposes some strategies for the public participation in the construction of municipal and local government web portals.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了地市级政府门户网站公众参与建设的策略。

sentences.english: The web portals of municipal and local government play an important role in the service and propaganda in the local areas.
sentences.chinese: 地市级政府门户网站具有很强的服务性和宣传性。

sentences.english: The portal strategy tries to own all of the information.
sentences.chinese: 而门户网站的战略是把所有的信息都据为己有。

sentences.english: The aforesaid person shall be reported to the administrative department of the Intellectual Property Portals for archival filing.
sentences.chinese: 上述人员须报知识产权门户网站管理部门备案。

sentences.english: The software giant is itching to buy the web portal he co-founded 13 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 微软这个软件业的巨头对这家门户网站窥视已久。

sentences.english: Radiohead recently launched a page on the "weibo" site of leading Chinese Internet portal Sina.com.
sentences.chinese: 日前在中国的门户网站新浪网开通了“微博”。

sentences.english: Cooperative Office System and Portal Site System of Bureau of Press and Publication.
sentences.chinese: 协同办公系统和新闻出版局门户网站系统。

sentences.english: The Asia-Pacific home network as the Asia-Pacific Media Group's vertical portal.
sentences.chinese: 亚太家居网作为亚太传媒集团旗下的垂直门户网站。

sentences.english: Moreover, the factors inducing the information security problems of government network are analyzed, including the human factors and the non-human factors.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，政府门户网站信息安全保障体系的理论构建。

sentences.english: Portal can be accessed throught web, apps and mobiles phones.
sentences.chinese: 门户网站可以被访问的思想，应用程序和手机电话。

sentences.english: This a exciting news about the new aion portal.
sentences.chinese: 这是关于新的永恒之门户网站令人兴奋的消息。

Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
